vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Πατρόβας, -ᾶ, ὁ
Patrobas: Rom.16:14.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.14
§ Patrobas, "father of existence"
Patrobas, (Proper name), Rom. 16:14*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
八羅巴 这个陽性專有名詞在希腊文的意思是 "父親的"
羅馬城內一個基督徒 (羅 16:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
八罗巴 这个阳性专有名词在希腊文的意思是 "父亲的"
罗马城内一个基督徒 (罗 16:14)
